articles.description: The Euclid space telescope will use its incredibly wide field of view to hunt for two of the universe's most mysterious components: dark matter and dark energy.
articles.content:
An artist's illustration showing Euclid in space. (Image credit: ESA, CC BY-SA 3.0 IGO)
The European Space Agency's Euclid space telescope successfully blasted off from Cape Canaveral, Florida, on J… [+4035 chars]
